products.title: Splash Brittany Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Splash brittany blue panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The light blue, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.
